mapper.sql: id, game_name, price, disCount, picture, video, label, download, release_date, sales, synopsis, developer, distributor, insert_time, remark, is_valid
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from game
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into game (id, game_name, price, disCount, picture, video, label, download, release_date, sales, synopsis, developer, distributor, insert_time, remark, is_valid) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gameName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{download,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releaseDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sales,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{synopsis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{developer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distributor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update game
